post:
**Who are we?**

We are West Plains Hosting! We offer VPS and dedicated servers from our Atlanta location. As well as dedicated servers in Paris and Amsterdam. We are not a re-seller and own our equipment. We offer 24/7 support via ticket and phone.


**Atlanta KVM Offers:**

**KVM1**

1 Core 512MB ECC RAM 
15GB HHD RAID 10 
Up to 200 Mbps Connection 
1TB Bandwidth 
1 IPv4 Address

[Only $1.50 a month with FREE instant set up!](https://clientarea.westplainshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)

**KVM2**

1 Core 1GB ECC RAM 
40GB HHD RAID 10 
Up to 200 Mbps Connection 
3TB Bandwidth 
1 IPv4 Address 

[Only $3 a month with FREE instant set up!](https://clientarea.westplainshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=30)

**KVM3**

2 Cores 1.5GB ECC RAM 
60GB HHD RAID 10 
Up to 300 Mbps Connection 
Unmetered Bandwidth* 1 IPv4 Address

[Only $5 a month with FREE instant set up!](https://clientarea.westplainshosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=31)

**Add-Ons**

$1 Per IPv4 Address (up to 5 without justification) 


We except: Bitcoin, Paypal, and most Credit/Debit Cards, and song+dance.

To order visit [westplainshosting.com](https://westplainshosting.com/vps) or give us a call 1-855-888-8628


*Speeds may be lowered after 10TB depending on network demands.
